name: Cat King (meowolf)
description:
Controller

a=left

d=right

&& arrow keys = moving left and right

space bar = jump

double jump O

triple jump O

infinite jump O

but there are sleeping cat kings and queens ahead of you...

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cat King is about a young cat named Sable who has dreams to become the king of his domain. He knows the only way to be a King is to reach the top of his tower. This vertical 2d platformer game is Sable’s journey of climbing up his tower and claiming his throne.
